A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Heads up\, my real rating is a 4\, but with so many giving it a half star because of multiracial characters or silly humor (which appeared in the originals too)  I felt the need to counter balance this with positivity. The movie is very good and very exciting. Lots of unexpected twists and new additions to the force! I liked that they went for it and gave us a movie that isn't just a complete rehash (the force awakens). Some of the scenes felt a bit long and unnecessary (Finn and rose at the casino) but overall a very entertaining film with lots of great new characters! I hope all of you whinny 40+ year old men can get over the fact that they adding new things to Star Wars and diversity to the cast. Grow up and just enjoy the film. :)
